text.div:
• Include these codes as defined in http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/who-smart-hiv-dak/CodeSystem/concept-codes
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    HIV.B.DE19Mobile testing (e.g. through vans or temporary testing facilities)Entry point for community-level testing - Mobile testing (e.g. through vans or temporary testing facilities)
    HIV.B.DE20Voluntary counselling and testing centres (not within a health facility setting)Entry point for community-level testing - Voluntary counselling and testing centres (not within a health facility setting)
    HIV.B.DE21Other community-based testingEntry point for community-level testing - Other community-based testing
